Title: Adventures in Odyssey: Shadow of a Doubt
Writer: Mike Joens (story), Mike Joens, Ken C. Johnson, Phil Lollar (radio series), Steve Harris (radio series)
Actors: Hal Smith, Victor DiMattia, Will Ryan, Joe Baker
Plot: There's a cat burglar on the prowl in Odyssey, one who looks a lot like . . . John Avery Whittaker! Could it be? The evidence against Whit is overwhelming. But Dylan isn't so sure. And when...
